CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Luxury Fashion?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Luxury Fashion is arc {Vintage}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Vintage?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Vintage is arc {Luxury Fashion}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Fast Fashion} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Sustainable Fashion to Vintage in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Sustainable Fashion to Fast Fashion in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Sustainable Fashion and Fast Fashion in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Sustainable Fashion and Fast Fashion is {161}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Luxury Fashion and Vintage in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Luxury Fashion and Vintage is {59}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Streetwear?
SC.A: The total flow output from Streetwear is {491}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Streetwear?
SC.A: The total flow input by Streetwear is {248}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 369? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {491} from {Streetwear} to {Fast Fashion}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 44? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {41} from {Vintage} to {Sustainable Fashion}, a flow of {39} from {Sustainable Fashion} to {Vintage}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 62 and 87? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {78} from {Luxury Fashion} to {Fast Fashion}, a flow of {65} from {Vintage} to {Luxury Fashion}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Streetwear to Fast Fashion or from Luxury Fashion to Vintage?
NC.A: The flow from {Streetwear} to {Fast Fashion} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Vintage to Sustainable Fashion, from Luxury Fashion to Fast Fashion, or from Luxury Fashion to Vintage?
NC.A: The flow from {Luxury Fashion} to {Fast Fashion} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Streetwear}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Fast Fashion} and {Streetwear}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Sustainable Fashion, Arc Fast Fashion, Arc Streetwear, Arc Vintage, Arc Luxury Fashion}.
